General.Name: Zhejiang Feida Environmental Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Feida Environmental Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in design, production, sale, and installation of environmental protection equipment in the People's Republic of China. It offers smoke, water, and solid waste pollution control, as well as manufactures equipment. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Zhuji, China.
